function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Exposure time between 0 and 5 minutes for each individual agent to a given number of agents in the building","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease transmission due to prolonged exposure","Mitigation":"Implement measures to reduce close interactions between agents and limit exposure time","Technologies":"Occupancy monitoring systems, automated crowd control, ventilation and air filtration systems","People":"Occupants in the building","Owner":"Building management, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Identifying the maximum number of people that agents are exposed to at the same time","Impact":"High exposure to a large number of individuals increases the risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Implement occupancy limits, staggered entry, and controlled density in different areas of the building","Technologies":"Occupancy tracking systems, automated entry control, sensor-based monitoring","People":"Occupants in the building","Owner":"Building management, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Average and standard deviations of the time of exposures to each number of people provide valuable information for quantitative risk assessment","Impact":"Enables the assessment of likelihood and impact of disease transmission based on exposure data","Mitigation":"Utilize exposure data to inform targeted mitigation strategies and intervention measures","Technologies":"Data analytics, machine learning algorithms, exposure modeling and simulation tools","People":"Public health authorities, building management","Owner":"Public health authorities, building management"}]}
